original_title: The Erotic Guide to Sexual Fantasies For Lovers
overview: This couples-oriented production encourages sexual fantasies as a means to strengthen the bond between lovers while exploring otherwise repressed sexual desires. Popular erotic themes -- exhibitionism, domination, same-sex fantasies, group sex, and more -- are recreated for open-minded couples in a series of vignettes. In addition, five prominent sex educators and therapists help answer some of the most frequently asked questions regarding sexual fantasies. Due to adult content, this video is intended for mature audiences only.
tagline: domination [influence], eroticism, fantasy, sexual, sexual-awareness, sexual-fantasy
title: The Erotic Guide to Sexual Fantasies For Lovers
